backend/main.mo: Motoko backend canister defining user profiles, jobs, applications, and access‑controlled CRUD methods for managing them.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels for diagnostics and API parity checks.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, hooks, pages, and styles.
frontend/docs/missing-canister-functions: Diagnostics document explaining how the frontend detects missing backend methods and how to reproduce related issues.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions using OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing the root element and loading the Vite React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and global layout with theming and notifications.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer component with branding, attribution, and basic page links.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component handling navigation, authentication actions, and role-based links for candidates and employers.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper that renders the header, footer, and page content.
frontend/src/components/applications/Can: Form that lets candidates submit a job application with a cover letter and handles mutation and validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Dialog explaining Internet Identity and guiding users through account setup steps.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleSetupMo: Modal prompting new authenticated users to choose a role and submit initial profile details.
frontend/src/components/jobs/EmployerJob: Form for employers to create job postings with details and dynamic requirements.
frontend/src/components/jobs/JobCard.tsx: Card UI showing a job's key details and linking to the job details page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity state loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods, including fetching and mutating user profiles, jobs, and applications.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and defines light/dark mode CSS variables for theme styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/CandidateDashboardPag: Displays the candidate’s job applications with corresponding job details, handling loading, empty states, and status badges.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerDashboardPage: Shows an employer’s job listings with tools to create and delete jobs, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerJobApplicatio: Displays a job’s applications for employers and allows updating application statuses, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/JobDetailPage.tsx: Displays job details, handles loading and missing‑job states, and shows an application form based on user authentication and application status.
frontend/src/pages/JobsBrowsePage.tsx: Loads and filters job listings using keyword and location inputs, rendering results or loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the marketing homepage with hero content, feature highlights, and navigation to job search or employer dashboard.
frontend/src/utils/actorDiagnostics.ts: Provides utilities to verify required backend actor methods and log diagnostics for missing methods.
frontend/src/utils/actorErrorMessages.ts: Normalizes actor errors into user‑friendly messages and detects missing‑method errors.
frontend/src/utils/actorGuards.ts: Defines guards for safely calling actor methods, including missing‑method error handling and a wrapped call helper.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash‑route support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom color tokens, container settings, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state metadata, including versioning, known issues, and a list of implemented features for the Instant Jobs clone.
